messages: Wanna grab a slice in Times Square? It's prob overpriced but idc
just walked thru Central Park and omg the fall colors r insane
Do u think if I yell loud enough the Statue of Liberty will hear me?
I swear I just saw someone famous at Whole Foods but idk who lol
Traffic on the 405 is making me regret every life choice rn
Wanna hike Runyon Canyon tmrw? The views r worth the sweat
Deep dish or thin crust 2nite? This is important
The wind off Lake Michigan just destroyed my hair completely
omg the Bean is so shiny I can see my whole face in it
My calves are DYING from these hills send help
Wanna bike across the Golden Gate Bridge? I'll bring snacks
just saw a sea lion at Pier 39 and it was judging me I swear
Walking the Freedom Trail tmrw, u in?
This chowdah is actually life-changing ngl
omg Harvard students everywhere and I feel so underdressed
Do u wanna see the monuments 2nite? They're all lit up
I'm eating on the National Mall and feeling v patriotic rn
just walked past the White House and there's like 50 tourists taking selfies lol
Beach day tmrw? I need to work on my tan b4 it's 2 l8
omg the Cuban sandwich I just ate was EVERYTHING
Ocean Drive is so pretty at sunset I can't even
Wanna hit up the Beltline l8r? I need my steps in
This sweet tea is sweeter than my grandma's compliments
omg I'm at the aquarium and the whale shark is MASSIVE
Everything really IS bigger in Texas including my food coma rn
Do u wanna check out Dealey Plaza? It's kinda heavy but historic
just bought a cowboy hat ironically but now I'm into it
Space Center Houston tmrw? I wanna feel like an astronaut
This humidity is NO JOKE my hair is officially ruined
omg the rodeo was actually so fun?? Didn't expect that
Cheesesteak debate: Geno's or Pat's? This is serious
just saw the Liberty Bell and it's smaller than I thought lol
Running up the Rocky steps tmrw who's w me?
Motown Museum was actually incredible I'm not gonna lie
Do u wanna check out some street art in Corktown?
omg the auto show has so many cool cars I wanna drive them all
These hills r trying to k*ll me but the view is worth it
Wanna grab a Primanti Bros sandwich? It has fries IN it
just counted like 20 bridges and I'm still not done wtf
Going up the Arch tmrw, hopefully I don't get vertigo lol
This BBQ is making me question every food choice I've made b4
omg the City Museum is like a playground for adults I'm obsessed
Everyone here works in tech and I feel v behind
Do u wanna tour some start-ups? Might get free swag
just saw the weirdest gadget at the Tech Museum ngl kinda want it
This coffee is so good I might cry actual tears
Wanna hit up Powell's Books? I could get lost there 4ever
omg I just saw someone riding a unicycle casually like it's normal here
Going up the Space Needle tmrw, the view is gonna b sick
It's been raining for 3 days straight but honestly it's kinda cozy?
omg Pike Place Market had a fish-throwing show and I screamed
It's 115 degrees rn how do ppl live here
Wanna hike Camelback Mountain b4 sunrise? It's cooler then
just saw a cactus taller than my house I'm shook
Lost $20 at blackjack but won free drinks so basically even?
Do u wanna see a Cirque show 2nite? They're supposed to b amazing
omg the Strip at night is like daylight but w more neon
just drove past Warner Bros and I SWEAR I saw a movie set
Traffic in the Valley is worse than I thought possible
Wanna grab In-N-Out? I'm craving animal style fries rn
Niagara Falls is SO LOUD I can't hear myself think
These buffalo wings r actually from Buffalo mind = blown
Do u wanna take the Maid of the Mist boat? We'll get soaked tho
Beale Street at night hits different ngl
omg I'm at Graceland and Elvis had STYLE
This BBQ is so good I might never eat anything else again
just tried surfing and fell off like 50 times but it was fun
Do u wanna watch the sunset at Waikiki? It's supposed to b perfect
omg I had poke for breakfast and I'm never going back 2 cereal
Did u know Akron is where they invented rubber? Random but cool
Wanna check out the Pro Football Hall of Fame? I'm feeling sporty
omg this small town energy is exactly what I needed rn
The mountains here r making me feel v small and inspired
Do u wanna go brewery hopping? Fort Collins has like 20
just breathed in the fresh air and my lungs r so happy they might cry
